author: Special Correspondent
V S
text:
RELIGION

Sri Kannanur Mariamman and Kundathu Kaliamman Temple: Thirukkalyana Utsavam and Kundam festival, manjal neeradal, 6 p.m.

Rathina Vinayakar Temple: Ashtami Puja, temple premises, DB Road, R.S. Puram, 7.30 p.m.

GENERAL

Larsen and Toubro – Public Charitable Trust: Felicitation of Batch VI – Trainees of Electrical skills training programme, P.S. Mallik, General Manager of L &T CSR takes part, Rathnam Tech Zone Auditorium,

4.30 p.m.

Tejaa Sakthi Institute of Technology for Women: National Conference on Environmental Science and Nanotechnology, 10 a.m.

Sri Shakthi Institute of Engineering and Technology: Intra College Project Exhibition, Blitz 16, 9.30 a.m.

DJ Academy of Design and Japan Foundation: Exhibition of Contemporary Japanese Posters, 9 a.m.

Dhanalakshmi Srinivasan College of Engineering: One-day seminar on Recent emerging areas of finance and human resource, 10 a.m.

Nehru Institute of Engineering and Technology: International Conference, 10 a.m.

SNS College of Technology: Short Term Training Programme, 10 a.m.

Dr.Kalaingar Karunanidhi Institute of Technology: Faculty Development Programme in association ICT Academy, 10 a.m.

H & C Stores: Children’s Book Fair, 100 feet road, near Ganga Yamuna Theatre, 10 a.m.

Kurinji Hospital: Clinical Meeting,

2 p.m.

TV Sekharan Memorial Matriculation Higher Secondary School: 9{+t}{+h}KG Graduation Day, 10.30 a.m.
title: In Coimbatore Today
